# Load required R packages
```{r}
library(foreach)
library(progress)
library(doParallel)
```

# Basic data generation settings
```{r}
set.seed(123)
```

# Data generation
```{r}
generate_data <- function(N, scenario, alpha_u, gamma_u, R_w, R_z, time = 5000) {
  chunk_size <- ceiling(N/getDoParWorkers())  
  
  alpha_0 <- 1;      gamma_0 <- -1
  beta_YX <- -0.5;   beta_XY <- 0.5
  alpha_v <- 1;      gamma_v <- -1
  alpha_z <- 1;      gamma_w <- 2
  gamma_z <- alpha_z * R_z; alpha_w <- gamma_w * R_w
  
  delta_u <- 1;      eta_u <- -1
  delta_v <- -0.5;   eta_v  <- 0.5
  
  V <- rnorm(N + time)
  U <- exp(V) + 2 * rbinom(N + time, size = 1, prob = 0.5) - 1
  
  if (scenario == "a") {
    epsilon_z <- rnorm(N + time)
    epsilon_w <- rnorm(N + time)
  } else if (scenario == "b") {
    epsilon_z <- runif(N + time, -1, 1)
    epsilon_w <- runif(N + time, -1, 1)
  } else if (scenario == "c") {
    epsilon_z <- 2 * rbinom(N + time, size = 1, prob = 0.5) - 1
    epsilon_w <- 2 * rbinom(N + time, size = 1, prob = 0.5) - 1
  }
  
  Z <- 1 + delta_u * U + delta_v * V + epsilon_z
  W <- 1 + eta_u * U + eta_v * V + epsilon_w
  
  u_Y <- 2 * rbinom(N + time, size = 1, prob = 0.5) - 1
  u_X <- 2 * rbinom(N + time, size = 1, prob = 0.5) - 1
  
  simulation_results <- foreach(i = seq(1, N, by = chunk_size), 
                              .combine = rbind, 
                              .packages = c("stats")) %dopar% { 
    current_chunk <- min(chunk_size, N - i + 1)
    chunk_indices <- i:(i + current_chunk - 1)
    
    results <- matrix(NA, nrow = current_chunk, ncol = 6)
    colnames(results) <- c("Y", "X", "Z", "W", "V", "U")
    
    for (j in 1:current_chunk) {
        idx <- chunk_indices[j]
      Y <- numeric(time)
      X <- numeric(time)
      
      Y[1] <- rnorm(1)
      X[1] <- rnorm(1)
      
      for (t in 2:time) {
        X[t] <- alpha_0 + beta_YX * Y[t-1] + alpha_v * V[idx] + alpha_z * Z[idx] + alpha_w * W[idx] + alpha_u * U[idx] + u_X[idx]
        Y[t] <- gamma_0 + beta_XY * X[t-1] + gamma_v * V[idx] + gamma_z * Z[idx] + gamma_w * W[idx] + gamma_u * U[idx] + u_Y[idx]
      }
      
      results[j,] <- c(Y[time], X[time], Z[idx], W[idx], V[idx], U[idx])
    }
    
    results
  }
  
  as.data.frame(simulation_results)
}
```

```{r}
scenarios <- c("a", "b", "c")

alpha_gamma_combinations <- list(
  c(alpha_u = 0.5, gamma_u = -0.5)
)

R_combinations <- list()
for(i in 0:10) {  
  R_w_val <- -0.5 + i * 0.1  
  R_z_val <- 0.5 - i * 0.1   
  R_combinations[[i+1]] <- c(R_w = R_w_val, R_z = R_z_val)
}

Ns <- c(5000)
```

```{r}
iter <- 200
all_iterations <- vector("list", iter)

cores <- parallel::detectCores() - 1
cl <- makeCluster(cores)
registerDoParallel(cl)

clusterExport(cl, c("generate_data"))

total_tasks <- iter * length(scenarios) * length(alpha_gamma_combinations) * length(R_combinations) * length(Ns)
current_task <- 0

pb <- progress_bar$new(
  format = "Total Progress [:bar] :percent | Completed: :current/:total | ETA: :eta",
  total = total_tasks,
  clear = FALSE,
  width = 80
)

for(i in 1:iter) {
  current_data <- list()
  
  for (scenario in scenarios) {
    current_data[[scenario]] <- list()
    
    for (combo in alpha_gamma_combinations) {
      alpha_u_val <- combo["alpha_u"]
      gamma_u_val <- combo["gamma_u"]
      combo_key <- paste0("alpha_u_", alpha_u_val, "_gamma_u_", gamma_u_val)
      current_data[[scenario]][[combo_key]] <- list()
      
      for (r_combo in R_combinations) {
        R_w_val <- r_combo["R_w"]
        R_z_val <- r_combo["R_z"]
        r_combo_key <- paste0("R_w_", R_w_val, "_R_z_", R_z_val)
        current_data[[scenario]][[combo_key]][[r_combo_key]] <- list()
      
        for (N_val in Ns) {
          cat(sprintf("\nCurrently executing: Iteration %d/200, Scenario %s, Alpha=%.2f, Gamma=%.2f, R_w=%.2f, R_z=%.2f, N=%d", 
                     i, scenario, alpha_u_val, gamma_u_val, R_w_val, R_z_val, N_val))
          
          results <- generate_data(
            N = N_val,
            scenario = scenario,
            alpha_u = alpha_u_val,
            gamma_u = gamma_u_val,
            R_w = R_w_val,
            R_z = R_z_val
          )
          
          current_data[[scenario]][[combo_key]][[r_combo_key]][[paste0("N_", N_val)]] <- results
          
          current_task <- current_task + 1
          pb$update(current_task/total_tasks)
        }
      }
    }
  }
  
  all_iterations[[i]] <- current_data
}

stopCluster(cl)

saveRDS(all_iterations, file = "iterations_200_5000.rds")

cat("\nSimulation completed. Results saved to 'iterations_200_5000.rds'\n")
```
